name: Hidden Protector
description:
Hidden Protector.

This game is a fps, open-world who also have rpg and narrative elements.


You wake up in a strange world, and you are lost.

Until a voice comes to you and tells you that you are dead.
He also tells you that you have been chosen to be an hidden protector.
You cannot go to hell or heaven you are just stuck in this mysterious place.
But you have one chance to get out of here.
You need to take control of all the cities in this world with the help of forgotten souls who are on your side.

But be careful some are against you.
So there's two sides (factions), the ones who wants to help you and the ones who are against you.

You find yourself in a war.
In the game you will have to defend yourself, the cities you control and organise the war to win.

Features :
  • First person shooter mechanics.

  • Huge open world with regions.

  • Fly over these forgotten lands.

  • Rpg elements with leveling.

  • Strategic elements for you to organise the war.

  • Multiple types of ennemies and allies.

  • Huge cities for you to fight and conquer.
